message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm asking for $11,500.  I think it's a fair price that reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I can go.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,200. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and this price feels more comfortable for me.
